reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are engaging and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: The material is tough, but Prof. Lee explains it well. The grading is fair, but the tests are difficult.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is very knowledgeable, and her labs are well-organized. The course is challenging, but she offers a lot of help.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are dry, and the readings are overwhelming. The exams are also too detailed.

reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Wang is the best! Her explanations are clear, and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is decent, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous. The assignments are straightforward though.

reviews.subject: Literary Analysis
reviews.review: Dr. Doe is very passionate about literature. She encourages deep thinking and class discussions are always interesting.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Prof. Adams is very difficult to follow. His lectures are all over the place and the tests are extremely hard.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. O'Connor is fantastic! She's approachable, and her lectures are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Stevens is knowledgeable, but his classes can be dull. The exams are fair, but not easy.

reviews.subject: Molecular Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is very organized and clear. The material is tough, but she provides a lot of support.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Green's lectures are confusing, and he doesn't explain concepts well. The textbook is more helpful.

reviews.subject: Modern Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White's passion for art is contagious. Her classes are engaging, and she makes learning enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: Prof. Harris knows his stuff. The class is challenging, but you learn a lot if you put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's class is interesting, but her grading is tough. The projects are informative, though.

reviews.subject: Ethics in Technology
reviews.review: Prof. King is amazing! He encourages debates and critical thinking. One of the best courses I've taken.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is knowledgeable, but her teaching style is too fast-paced. It's hard to keep up.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Mind
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is a great lecturer. He makes complex ideas accessible, but the readings are heavy.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is good, but her exams are tricky. You really need to study hard to do well.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Business
reviews.review: Prof. Scott's class is incredibly practical. His real-world examples make the course material come alive.
